trans-unit.source: Defines the access rights to use when you create access and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 定义要在创建访问和审核规则时使用的访问权限。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights> enumeration specifies which file system actions are allowed for a particular user account and which file system actions are audited for a particular user account.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>枚举指定的文件系统操作允许特定用户帐户以及哪些文件系统操作进行审核的特定用户帐户。

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights> enumeration when you create an access rule with the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRule> class or when you create an audit rule with the <xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule> class.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights>枚举时创建的访问规则<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRule>类或当你创建的审核规则<xref:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAuditRule>类。

trans-unit.source: This enumeration contains several specific system rights values and several values that are a combination of those specific values.
trans-unit.target: 此枚举包含几个特定系统权限值和几个值都是这些特定值的组合。

trans-unit.source: It is easier to use the combination values, such as FullControl, Read, and Write, rather than specifying each component value separately.
trans-unit.target: 它是易于使用的组合值，如 FullControl、 读取、 和写入，而不是分别指定每个组件值。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to make changes to the system access control list (SACL).
trans-unit.target: 指定更改系统访问控制列表 (SACL) 的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to change the security and audit rules that are associated with a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定更改与管道关联的安全性和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to create a new pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定创建新管道的权限。

trans-unit.source: Setting this right also sets the <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.Synchronize" /> right.
trans-unit.target: 设置此权限也将设置 <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.Synchronize" /> 权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to delete a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定删除管道的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to exert full control over a pipe, and to modify access control and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 指定对某个管道进行完全控制并修改访问控制和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: This value represents the combination of all rights in this enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 此值表示在此枚举中的所有权限的组合。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to read from the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定从管道读取的权限。

trans-unit.source: This right includes the <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadAttributes" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadData" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadExtendedAttributes" />, and <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadPermissions" /> rights.
trans-unit.target: 此权限包括 <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadAttributes" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadData" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadExtendedAttributes" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadPermissions" /> 权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to read file system attributes from a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定从管道读取文件系统属性的权限。

trans-unit.source: This does not include the right to read data, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括读取数据、扩展文件系统属性或访问和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to read data from the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定从管道读取数据的权限。

trans-unit.source: This does not include the right to read file system attributes, extended file system attributes, or access and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括读取文件系统属性、扩展文件系统属性或访问和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to read extended file system attributes from a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定从管道读取扩展文件系统属性的权限。

trans-unit.source: This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or access and audit rules.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括读取数据、文件系统属性或访问和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to read access and audit rules from the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定从管道读取访问和审核规则的权限。

trans-unit.source: This does not include the right to read data, file system attributes, or extended file system attributes.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括读取数据、文件系统属性或扩展文件系统属性的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to read and write from the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定从管道进行读和写的权限。

trans-unit.source: This right includes the <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadAttributes" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadData" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadExtendedAttributes" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadPermissions" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteAttributes" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteData" />, and <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteExtendedAttributes" /> rights.
trans-unit.target: 此权限包括 <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadAttributes" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadData" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadExtendedAttributes" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.ReadPermissions" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteAttributes" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteData" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteExtendedAttributes" /> 权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies whether the application can wait for a pipe handle to synchronize with the completion of an I/O operation.
trans-unit.target: 指定应用程序是否能够等待管道句柄，以便与 I/O 操作的完成保持同步。

trans-unit.source: The Synchronize value is automatically set when allowing access to the pipe and automatically excluded when denying access to the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 同步值是自动设置允许对管道的访问时，自动排除时拒绝对管道的访问。

trans-unit.source: The right to create a pipe requires this value.
trans-unit.target: 创建管道的权限需要此值。

trans-unit.source: Note that if you do not explicitly set this value when you create a pipe, the value will be set automatically for you.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，是否创建管道时未显式设置此值，则这将会自动设置为你。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to change the owner of a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定更改管道的所有者的权限。

trans-unit.source: Note that owners of a pipe have full access to that resource.
trans-unit.target: 请注意：管道的所有者对该资源拥有完全访问权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to write to the pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定写入管道的权限。

trans-unit.source: This right includes the <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteAttributes" />, <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteData" />, and <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteExtendedAttributes" /> rights.
trans-unit.target: 此权限包括 <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteAttributes" />、<see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteData" /> 和 <see cref="F:System.IO.Pipes.PipeAccessRights.WriteExtendedAttributes" /> 权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to write file system attributes to a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定向管道写入文件系统属性的权限。

trans-unit.source: This does not include the right to write data or extended file system attributes.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括写入数据或扩展文件系统属性的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to write data to a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定向管道写入数据的权限。

trans-unit.source: This does not include the right to write file system attributes or extended file system attributes.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括写入文件系统属性或扩展文件系统属性的权限。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the right to write extended file system attributes to a pipe.
trans-unit.target: 指定向管道写入扩展文件系统属性的权限。

trans-unit.source: This does not include the right to write file attributes or data.
trans-unit.target: 这不包括写入文件属性或数据的权限。
